biotools.summary: C-program for the identification of attC sites in any type of DNA data. It uses a hidden Markov model (HMM) to describe each part of the attC site in a probabilistic manner.

bioschemas.name: HattCI
bioschemas.summary: C-program for the identification of attC sites in any type of DNA data. It uses a hidden Markov model (HMM) to describe each part of the attC site in a probabilistic manner.
